title: About
text:
Ph.D.Â candidate in the Ecology and Evolutionary Biology department at UCLA in the Blumstein Lab. I am studying the long-term consequences of early-life adversity in wild yellow-bellied marmots (check-out my latest paper).
I got my B.A. in Human Ecology at the College of the Atlantic.
